emerging_technologies.name: Automated Development AI
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously developing, debugging, and optimizing software with minimal human intervention.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for mass job displacement in coding professions; shift in software development paradigms.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory acceptance, AI ethics concerns, and the need for continuous learning in the software industry.

emerging_technologies.name: Urban Scale Autonomous Infrastructure
emerging_technologies.description: Infrastructure that autonomously manages traffic, waste, energy, and public services at a city-wide scale.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduction in urban congestion, increased efficiency, but also privacy concerns with pervasive surveillance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Government investment, public acceptance of autonomous systems, and the need for standardized protocols.

emerging_technologies.name: Brain-Computer Interface for Cognitive Enhancement
emerging_technologies.description: Non-invasive brain-computer interfaces that enhance cognitive functions, memory, and learning capabilities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ethical debates on human enhancement, potential for social inequality, and privacy concerns over brain data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Medical and educational endorsements, public acceptance, and regulatory approval for enhancement technologies.

emerging_technologies.name: Planetary Resource Management
emerging_technologies.description: Systems for managing resources on extraterrestrial bodies, focusing on mining, energy, and habitat construction.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: New economic models, potential for resource conflicts, and environmental considerations in space.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: International space law, economic viability, and technological advancements in space exploration.

emerging_technologies.name: Zero-Carbon Energy Grid
emerging_technologies.description: A fully integrated energy grid that uses only renewable energy sources and achieves zero net carbon emissions.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Significant reduction in greenhouse gas emissions, job creation in renewable sectors, and potential energy price volatility.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Government incentives, technological breakthroughs in energy storage, and public demand for sustainable solutions.

emerging_technologies.name: Blockchain for Digital Identity
emerging_technologies.description: Decentralized systems for managing digital identities, providing secure and verifiable personal data management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increased individual control over personal data, potential for reducing identity theft, but also risks of data loss if keys are misplaced.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory frameworks, public trust in blockchain, and integration with existing systems.

epoch_themes.description: A time where automation extends beyond vehicles to urban infrastructure and resource management.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Increased efficiency, potential unemployment shifts, and new forms of governance for autonomous systems.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Shift towards smart cities, demand for new regulatory frameworks, and growth in AI and robotics industries.

epoch_themes.description: Advancements in neural interfaces and cognitive tools begin to alter human capabilities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Debates on ethics, inequality, and the nature of human intelligence.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increasing interest in transhumanism, rise in cognitive enhancement research, and potential for new educational paradigms.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on zero-carbon technologies and the exploration of space resources.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Reduction in environmental impact, new job markets in space-related industries, and potential for off-planet living.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Climate change mitigation, international space cooperation, and the growth of a space economy.

epoch_themes.description: Emphasis on secure digital identity and privacy through blockchain and other technologies.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhanced personal data control, potential for reducing cybercrime, and new approaches to data governance.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased cybersecurity measures, regulatory changes for data protection, and the rise of decentralized systems.
